trans-unit.source: Hosts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control in a cell of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> for editing strings.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> em uma célula de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> para edição de cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> classe deriva o `abstract` classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control that allows users to edit text.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> hosts um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> controle que permite aos usuários editar texto.

trans-unit.source: Special properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Incluem propriedades especiais adicionadas à classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.

trans-unit.source: These properties allow you to access the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades permitem que você acesse hospedado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> controle e seus atributos e o formato para exibir os valores do conjunto.

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados for um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contendo <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objetos, o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> deve ser definido como um tipo de dados que pode ser editado logicamente em um controle de caixa de texto.

trans-unit.source: The following data types are automatically associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes tipos de dados são associados automaticamente com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64> , <xref:System.Single>, e <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, and <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes tipos não têm suporte total pelo Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, e <xref:System.TimeSpan>.

trans-unit.source: (Operators are not allowed.)
trans-unit.target: (Operadores não são permitidos).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>.

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, paste it into a form that has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> named `dataGrid1` and call it from the constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo de código, cole-o em um formulário que tenha um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> chamado `dataGrid1` e chamá-lo a partir do construtor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for the column with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> para a coluna à qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> será associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> with a specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> com um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to be associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> é uma coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> é uma coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for the column with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> para a coluna à qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> será associado.

trans-unit.source: The format used to format the column values.
trans-unit.target: O formato usado para formatar os valores da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> e o formato especificados.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a custom format for the displayed data.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um formato personalizado para os dados exibidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to be associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: The format used.
trans-unit.target: O formato usado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> é a coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> class with a specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" /> com um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> e formato especificados.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a coluna é a coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an edit operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na qual uma operação de edição está sendo interrompida.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method rolls back any change made to the column and invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Esse método reverterá qualquer alteração feita na coluna e invoca o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> ao qual a coluna pertence.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha editada.

trans-unit.source: Inititates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para concluir um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value was successfully committed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor tiver sido confirmado com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring.
trans-unit.target: O método verifica para garantir que uma edição de fato está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: If so, it formats the value appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, ele formata o valor adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the method enters <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> into the column; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method to commit the value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `null`, insere o método <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> para a coluna; caso contrário, ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> método para confirmar o valor.

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when an editing operation is committed.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> durante a edição de uma operação é confirmada.

trans-unit.source: Informs the column that the focus is being conceded.
trans-unit.target: Informa a coluna de que o foco está sendo concedido.

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Neste método substituído, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle hospedado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> está oculto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> ao qual a coluna pertence.

trans-unit.source: The row number in this column being edited.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha nesta coluna que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual o controle deve ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a coluna é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor for somente leitura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no controle.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a célula é visível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula estiver visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares a cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Prepara uma célula para edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle da grade no local da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method when an editing operation is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> da classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> método quando uma operação de edição está prestes a começar.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit%2A> method to change the text of a clicked cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Edit%2A> método para alterar o texto de uma célula clicado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controle.

trans-unit.source: Ends an edit operation on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Encerra a operação de edição no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: To edit the value of a cell, call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> before changing the value.
trans-unit.target: Para editar o valor de uma célula, chame o <xref:System.Data.DataRow> do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> antes de alterar o valor.

trans-unit.source: You must invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method on both the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects before the change is committed.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> método em ambos os <xref:System.Data.DataRow> e <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objetos antes da alteração é confirmada.

trans-unit.source: The following example invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> method before editing a column's value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> método antes de editar o valor de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: Enters a <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> in the column.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value into the cell.
trans-unit.target: Insere o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> valor na célula.

trans-unit.source: The following example tests a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to determine its column type.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir testa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> para determinar o tipo de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the column is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> allows `null` values, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EnterNullValue%2A> method invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se a coluna for uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>e o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> permite `null` valores, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> está definida e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EnterNullValue%2A> método invocado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os caracteres que especificam como o texto é formatado.

trans-unit.source: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: O caractere ou os caracteres que especificam como o texto é formatado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property specifies how values are displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade especifica como os valores são exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, defina a propriedade como "c" para especificar que os valores serão formatados como moeda local.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> para o computador é usado para determinar o formato de moeda real.

trans-unit.source: The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed.
trans-unit.target: Os valores são automaticamente formatados para o tipo nativo quando dados são alterados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).

trans-unit.source: The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type.
trans-unit.target: O formato que você aplicar deve ser apropriado para o tipo de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados forem numéricos por natureza use uma das cadeias de caracteres de formato numérico.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> propriedade para um novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instância construída com uma identificação de cultura apropriada.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the application, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> para o aplicativo, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> objeto para uma nova <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instância construída com uma identificação de cultura apropriada.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object and assigns it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> do objeto e o atribui para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade como "c" para especificar que a coluna deve exibir valores como moeda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações específicas da cultura usadas para determinar como os valores são formatados.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> interface, such as the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />, como a classe <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to one of the formatting characters, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses the information provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade com um dos caracteres de formatação, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> usa as informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> propriedade para especificar formatação que culturais específicos para usar.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> estiver definida como o caractere de formato "c" (para moeda), você também pode especificar que o símbolo para o lira seja usado.

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, crie um novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> do objeto com a ID de localidade para Itália e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> propriedade para o novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object and assigns it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> do objeto e o atribui para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade como "c" para especificar que a coluna deve exibir valores como moeda.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura de uma célula em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The height of a cell.
trans-unit.target: A altura de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetMinimumHeight%2A> is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetMinimumHeight%2A> é calculado somando-se o tamanho da fonte da coluna mais de um valor de margem.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar formas na tela.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height to be used in for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura a ser usada para redimensionar automaticamente as colunas.

trans-unit.source: The height the cells automatically resize to.
trans-unit.target: A altura para qual as células são redimensionada automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetPreferredHeight%2A> to return the height a column is automatically resized to.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetPreferredHeight%2A> para retornar a altura de uma coluna é automaticamente redimensionado para.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar formas na tela.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the optimum width and height of the cell in a specified row relative to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a largura e a altura ideal da célula em uma linha especificada em relação ao valor indicado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as dimensões da célula.

trans-unit.source: The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values.
trans-unit.target: A melhor largura e altura é calculado medindo o tamanho da cadeia de caracteres, levando em conta sua fonte e seus atributos e adicionar valores de margem.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> to return a <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> para retornar um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.

trans-unit.source: Hides the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" /> control and moves the focus to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Oculta o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" /> e move o foco para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a coluna no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Paints the a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />, and row number.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> e o número de linha especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o conteúdo da coluna deve ser alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o conteúdo precisar ser alinhado à direita; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />, row number, and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Pinta um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />, número de linha e alinhamento especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> para determinar o valor para desenhar na célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método é chamado para desenhar a célula e seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that paints the background.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que pinta a tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that paints the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que pinta a cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o conteúdo da coluna deve ser alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o conteúdo precisar ser alinhado à direita; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />, row number, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />, and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Pinta um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />, número de linha, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> e cor de primeiro plano especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> para determinar o valor para desenhar na célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método é chamado para desenhar a célula e seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method to paint a clicked cell with new foreground and background color.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> método para desenhar uma célula clicada pela nova cor de primeiro plano e plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text and surrounding rectangle at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado e o retângulo ao redor do local especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém os dados de limites do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres a ser desenhada na tela.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o texto é alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the given location with the specified alignment.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto e o retângulo no local fornecido com o alinhamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> objeto definido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade para formatar o valor antes do desenho-lo para a tela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém os dados de limites do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres a ser desenhada na tela.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the rectangle's background color
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que determina a cor da tela de fundo do retângulo

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that determines the rectangles foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que determina a cor de primeiro plano dos retângulos.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o texto é alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the specified location with the specified colors and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto e o retângulo no local especificado com as cores e o alinhamento indicados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> propriedade para formatar o valor antes do desenho-lo para a tela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that formats the values displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> que formata os valores exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether the text box column is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Define um valor que indica se a coluna da caixa de texto é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text box column is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a coluna de caixa de texto é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> holds to the control used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Remove a referência que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> mantém no controle usado para editar os dados.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the reference that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> holds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control, in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Este método remove a referência que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> mantém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> controle para liberar recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control is added to.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> é ao qual o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> é adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: When this methods is called, the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse método é chamado, hospedado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle é adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> to associate both controls with the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> para associar os dois controles com a mesma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hosted <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: Um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> hospedado pela coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following example changes the background color of the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir altera a cor de plano de fundo da hospedado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> that supplies the data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> que fornece os dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha a ser atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The text that will be displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto que será exibido na célula.

trans-unit.source: Updates the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a interface do usuário.
